name: Bareback Reincarnation - It's Just That Easy to Brave a Different World
name_original: Bareback Reincarnation - It's Just That Easy to Brave a Different World
description:
《Bareback Reincarnation - It's Just That Easy to Brave a Different World》is a card battle adventure game developed by Ex-Erotia and published by BokiBoki Games.

■ Story

The protagonist, a weary corporate slave, found himself unexpectedly transported to an Isekai during overtime work.
To his amazement, he discovered that his stamina recovers at an extraordinary rate, and even more astonishingly,
his seminal fluid possesses the unique ability to "enhance magical essence" and "strengthen skills" for female beings without causing pregnancy!

Embark on an exciting adventure as a wandering traveler in this fantasy realm, wielding the powers of a "Demonoid" to conquer the hearts of the girls.



A former member of the mercenary group, he ran a bar after retiring, providing drinks and information.


The former adventure teammate of the tavern proprietress, who is good at using knives and poison traps.


The former adventure teammate of the tavern proprietress, who serves as a priest in the main city temple.


A fighter with unknown origins, suspecting that the hero has colluded with the devil.

■ Basic gameplay



At the beginning, the player will randomly draw five cards.
After deciding the order of playing the cards, press the FIGHT button, and the arranged cards will attack in order.



When defending, as long as you play a card of the same color, the attack is invalid.
If it corresponds to a card of a different color, the attack is established and damage is dealt.



You can use the money you get after the battle to buy the same cards in the store, and get better abilities by synthesizing and strengthening the cards in the card library.
